data.title: Martin Jensen - Network Integration Architect at Ribbon Communications
data.meta_description: Martin Jensen has a diverse work experience spanning over several companies and roles within the telecommunications industry.
data.text:
Martin Jensen has a diverse work experience spanning over several companies and roles within the telecommunications industry. Martin'smost recent position was as a Network Integration Architect at Ribbon Communications, where they worked on various network transformation projects and deployments. Prior to that, they served as the Director of Sustaining Engineering at Airvana and was responsible for driving product improvements and network performance enhancements. Martin also worked as the Director of Customer Engineering at both Equipe Communications and Lucent, where they provided engineering consulting support, prioritized features, and helped customers optimize their core networks for emerging technologies. Additionally, they held leadership positions in sustaining engineering at Ascend Communications and Cascade Communications. Martin began their career at BBN Communications as a Senior Software Engineer. Overall, they have extensive experience in network integration, sustaining engineering, customer engineering, and product management.

Martin Jensen attended Central New England College from 1982 to 1985, where they pursued a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science.
